thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 109 of 7354
thread.title: Dennis Fuerst
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Dennis Fuerst

author: Dennis Fuerst
title: Dennis Fuerst
text: B&H is my "go to" source for all of my camera gear. I'm a new convert from Nikon DSLR equipment to Sony mirrorless cameras and B&H has exactly what I want and need for my photographic needs. I especially like the ease of working with their website. I can enter a product - without placing an order - and come back the next day to add to my order or change out an item on my list. When I'm ready to click "buy" everything is ready to go.
